ygData.msgSnippet: *Blizzard smiles* Blizzard: Maybe I can make it better... *Blizzard moves closer to Sinister ready to lock a kiss with him* *Twister starts letting out a low

Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

*Blizzard smiles*

Blizzard: Maybe I can make it better...

*Blizzard moves=
 closer to Sinister ready to lock a kiss with him*

*Twister starts letting=
 out a low growl. She didn't want to make Blizzard mad and lose her as frie=
nd. She knows they will always be sisters but she wanted them to be friends=
 but she was afraid that if Blizzard gets more involved with Sinister than =
she might be forgoten about and left behind. She sits there and tries to ig=
nore Blizzard's action and turns back to Sinesis*

Twister: I think you sho=
uld get to a CR Chamber but thats only my suggestion...

*Twister says with=
 her optics blinking quickly trying to ignore Blizzard and Sinister*




*I=
nfectra nods to Stranato and smiles when Airbomber wraps his arms around he=
r*

Infectra: Do we have anywhere to go, anywhere?

*Infectra asks Airbombe=
r with sadness in her optics*
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECO=
DE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, July 27, 2000 7:30 PM
  Sub=
ject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  Sinesis and Sinister both smile. Dracona frown=
s, nobody ever liked her, Plintissa even used her, but no more of that now,=
 she was her own agent. But what Dracona didn't want Sinesis and Sinister t=
o know, is that she had escaped from their programming and had been doing t=
his stuff on her own. Dracona walked around the Radicons and up to Sinesis =
and Sinister.

  "I'm fine, Blizzard, but I hurt right here." Sinister said=
, he touched his lips.

  "How can you be fine? That damn 3D and stuff almo=
st killed us! Personally, I ache all over!" Sinesis said.

  "Yeah, I know.=
" Sinister said. He winked to Sinesis. Train Wreck turned to Dracona.

  "I=
 never felt so good, I feel like I can lock on a Rings of Saturn and break =
someones arm beyond repair!" Train Wreck said.

  "Good." Dracona simply re=
plied.

  Stranato and Airbomber look at each other, they were worried.

  =
"Watch your back, Infectra, remember my training tips." Stranato said. Airb=
omber wrapped his arms around Infectra, at all costs he would certainly giv=
e his life to protect her...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: il=
ovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Wednesday, July 26, 20=
00 8:23 PM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    *Infectra runs after Airbo=
mber and Stranato*


    *Blizzard and Twister stand there watching the thr=
ee run away*

    Blizzard: Yeah, we're with you.

    *Twister nods*

    =
*Blizzard walks up to Sinister*

    Blizzard: Are you okay?

    *Twister =
walks up to Sinesis*

    Twister: Are your damages bad?
      ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      =
Sent: Wednesday, July 26, 2000 7:45 PM
      Subject: Neo Beast Wars


    =
  Deemos and Inzola walk up to Lunarpine and Ramulus.

      "Hello?" Deemo=
s asked, he was getting mad.

      Gangon's spark is almost DEAD, his spar=
k was trying to join with the Matrix.

      Plintissa gets up and Airbombe=
r jumps next to her. Dracona fires an ice beam. Airbomber jumps out of the =
way and his arm is frozen as he pushes Plintissa out of the way. Dracona la=
ughs. But suddenly.

      Dracona: What the?

      Dracona is grabbed and=
 listed up, and gets the Dudley Death Drop from Stronghold and Blender. Ble=
nder does the Diamond Cutter sign.

      Blender: Bang!

      "Nothing li=
ke a good beating, as long as your not the one recieving it." Stronghold sa=
id. Sinesis and Sinister fired beams that blasted Blender and Stronghold fr=
om behind. They suddenly had trouble moving. Sinesis and Sinister stood up =
smiling.

      "Take a licking and keep on ticking!" Sinister said. The de=
vice they were holding was a reprograming device. Stronghold and Blender st=
ared mindlessly. Stranato looked on in shock. Dracona stands up and slaps B=
lender. He wakes up. She slaps Stronghold and wakes him up. Blender turns a=
nd Train Wreck is running by. Blender trips him up! Train Wreck is kicked i=
n the ribs by Dracona. Sinesis and Sinister fired at him with the reprogram=
ming beam. Train Wreck stares, looking more evil than before. Arrow is grab=
bed and whipped by Stronghold, right into Blender's clotheline. Sinesis and=
 Sinister fire the beam and hit Arrow as well. Arrow suddenly turns on Airb=
omber, firing at him. Airbomber moves out of the way as a beam hits the spo=
t. Suddenly, the device explodes and blows off Sinesis' arm. Plintissa is h=
olding a smoking blaster. Plintissa and Artist run as Sinesis fires furious=
ly with his other arm. Plintissa and Artist escape. Airbomber is helped up =
by Stranato.

      "Infectra, run!" Airbomber said. Stranato and Airbomber=
 run, leaving their former Radicon teammates behind. Train Wreck, Sinesis, =
Sinister, Arrow, Stronghold, and Blender stand next to their leader, Dracon=
a.

      "Our device was destroyed!" Sinister said.

      "No matter, we'=
ll get those 5." Dracona said.

      Sinesis pokes at where his arm was.

=
      "Blizzard, Twister, you with us?" Dracona asked.

      Stranato and =
Airbomber flee into the woods.

      Plintissa and Artist run over a hill.=


      Dracona contacts Zardus.

      "Zardus, this is anonymous bot look=
ing for a good side, are you interested in a good team of 9 bots?" Dracona =
asks...
